alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene; Owen; Parke; Putnam; Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:57PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Vigo, northeastern Sullivan, Clay, Owen, southern Parke, northern Greene and southern Putnam Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rockville to near Brazil to near Palestine. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brazil around 1205 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Spencer. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 11 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Greene; Owen; Parke; Putnam; Sullivan; Vigo
